text: The crowdfunding/vc event just sold out
they should have had more rewards

also - I know there's work happening on food sponsorships. Can I get an update on the latest/greatest? We're really down to the wire and need to make some judgement calls. 

I know we're doing Costco-ish for snacks for both pre-party and hackathon itself. We still need beer (for preparty and hackathon), breakfast, and lunch at hackathon. 

What's our plan and our plan b?
More importantly, when do we ditch plan A and move into plan B?
We need to define a cutoff date that leaves us sufficient time to enact a Plan B so that weâ€™re not scrambling. It seems that there are still too many things in the air.
Can we get clarity on this please?

The cutoff date was Friday, but if you want to pull the trigger on catering/pizza, I'll look exclusively  for cash sponsors . Beer is the easiest though so I'd hold off on that one until Monday/Tuesday
